content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.7 - Documentation

State Regulations

For the purpose of establishing compliance in accordance
with this Part, the local department, by using case records, special logs, annotation of inclusions with assistance checks, and other such written
statements, shall provide documentation for the following: (a) the personal offer with date of offer. This shall be so noted in writing by the welfare examiner: (1)
on the public-assistance application and
redetermination forms in the case of all income-maintenance applicants and
recipients; (2)
on the medical
assistance application and recertification forms in the case of
medically-needy-only recipients; (b) the mailing of the flyer to
public-assistance and medically-needy-only families; (c) the mailing of the form letter to foster
parents; (d) the mailing of the
department form letter to public-assistance families at the time of case
closing; (e) the notification in
writing to public-assistance applicants at the time the application was denied
or withdrawn; (f) the oral and
written requests, with the date each request was made, for social, educational, and medical services, the disposition of each request with the date of
implementation; the source from which the services are to be provided; and the
method of payment. Notes
